name: Tokugawa Shogunate
startIntroPart1: The Tokugawa Shogunate welcomes you. Our strength lies in our unity and culture.
startIntroPart2: Isolation is the name of the game.
introduction: We are the Tokugawa Shogunate, guardians of Japan's tradition and strength.
declaringWar: Prepare to face the wrath of the samurai!
afterPeace: Peace is restored. Let us prosper together.
defeated: Our honor remains, even in defeat. The Tokugawa Shogunate will rise again.
tradeRequest: The Shogunate offers you this trade. Consider it wisely.
uniques: [+10]% Strength <for [All] units> <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles>
[-90]% Gold from Great Merchant trade missions
